name: Tech Tank
description:
Tech Tank is a tech policy think tank, which aims to shape the future of democracy online and offline through digital solutions and ‘Civic Tech’. 

VOTING ENGINE
Accelerator Application: 			http://bit.ly/2TJvaiK
Tech Requirements: 			bit.ly/37leguH

jobs.title: Chief Technology Officer
jobs.description:
About Tech Tank
Tech Tank is a tech policy think tank, which aims to shape the future of democracy online and offline through digital solutions and ‘Civic Tech’. 

Role
Responsible for outlining the company's technological vision, implementing technology strategies, and ensuring that the technological resources are aligned with the company's business needs.

Organisational Structure
You will be responsible for managing the Head of Design, Head of Product, Head of Development and Head of Testing.

Compensation
Tech Tank is a nascent company, currently being built by volunteers who are passionate about the mission of the company. All employees will begin as volunteers, as a way to ensure that our core leadership team is highly motivated and prosocial.

For more information see here:
https://www.ttechtank.com/jobs

jobs.title: UX Designer
jobs.description:
Looking for a freelance UX / Product Designer to work with Voting Engine, a hot new Start Up in London - advancing democratic and inclusive decision-making in companies, organisations and  government.

We will need you to 
turn these tech requirements (bit.ly/37leguH) into a high fidelity, clickable prototype
Produce a logo
Produce a Style guide. 

The deadline for the work submission is Jan 29th (as we need to meet deadlines to enter into spring accelerator programmes). 

If you are interested in the job, please could you kindly send us the following details:-

Hrs required: 
Hourly Rate (£): 
Behance:
Dribble:
Website:
Github:
Mobile:
Email:
Location:

Thank you very much for your application. 

Warm regards, 

Francesca
CEO, Ttech Tank
francesca.tabor@ttechtank.com
https://www.ttechtank.com/
